verses.verse: And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> put <S%H2330><s%> forth <S%H2330><s%> a riddle, <S%H2420><s%> and speak <S%H4911><s%> a parable <S%H4912><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

And say, <S%H559><s%> Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> A great <S%H1419><s%> eagle <S%H5404><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wings, <S%H3671><s%> long winged, <S%H750><s%> <S%H83><s%> full <S%H4392><s%> of feathers, <S%H5133><s%> which <S%H834><s%> had divers <S%H7553><s%> colors, <S%H7553><s%> came <S%H935><s%> to Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the highest <S%H6788><s%> branch <S%H6788><s%> of the cedar: <S%H730><s%>

He cropped <S%H6998><s%> off the top <S%H7218><s%> of his young <S%H3242><s%> twigs, <S%H3242><s%> and carried <S%H935><s%> it into a land <S%H776><s%> of traffic; <S%H3667><s%> he set <S%H7760><s%> it in a city <S%H5892><s%> of merchants. <S%H7402><s%>

He took <S%H3947><s%> also of the seed <S%H2233><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> and planted it in a fruitful <S%H2233><s%> field; <S%H7704><s%> he placed <S%H3947><s%> it by great <S%H7227><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> it as a willow <S%H6851><s%> tree.

And it grew, <S%H6779><s%> and became <S%H1961><s%> a spreading <S%H5628><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> of low <S%H8217><s%> stature, <S%H6967><s%> whose branches <S%H1808><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> him, and the roots <S%H8328><s%> thereof were under <S%H8478><s%> him: so it became <S%H1961><s%> a vine, <S%H1612><s%> and brought <S%H5375><s%> forth <S%H6213><s%> branches, <S%H905><s%> and shot <S%H7971><s%> forth sprigs. <S%H6288><s%>

There was also another <S%H259><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> eagle <S%H5404><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> and many <S%H7227><s%> feathers: <S%H5133><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> did bend <S%H3719><s%> her roots <S%H8328><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> him, and shot <S%H7971><s%> forth her branches <S%H1808><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> him, that he might water <S%H8248><s%> it by the furrows <S%H6170><s%> of her plantation. <S%H4302><s%>

It was planted <S%H8362><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> soil <S%H7704><s%> by great <S%H7227><s%> waters, <S%H4325><s%> that it might bring <S%H6213><s%> forth <S%H6213><s%> branches, <S%H6057><s%> and that it might bear <S%H5375><s%> fruit, <S%H6529><s%> that it might be a goodly <S%H155><s%> vine. <S%H1612><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> you, Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Shall it prosper? <S%H6743><s%> shall he not pull <S%H5423><s%> up the roots <S%H8328><s%> thereof, and cut <S%H7082><s%> off the fruit <S%H6529><s%> thereof, that it wither? <S%H3001><s%> it shall wither <S%H3001><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the leaves <S%H2964><s%> of her spring, <S%H6780><s%> even without <S%H3808><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> power <S%H2220><s%> or many <S%H7227><s%> people <S%H5971><s%> to pluck <S%H5375><s%> it up by the roots <S%H8328><s%> thereof.

Yes, behold, <S%H2009><s%> being planted, <S%H8362><s%> shall it prosper? <S%H6743><s%> shall it not utterly wither, <S%H3001><s%> when the east <S%H6921><s%> wind <S%H7307><s%> touches <S%H5060><s%> it? it shall wither <S%H3001><s%> in the furrows <S%H6170><s%> where <S%H5921><s%> it grew. <S%H6780><s%>
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Say <S%H559><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> to the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> Know <S%H3045><s%> you not what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things mean? tell <S%H559><s%> them, Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> to Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and has taken <S%H3947><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> thereof, and led <S%H935><s%> them with him to Babylon; <S%H894><s%>

And has taken <S%H3947><s%> of the king's <S%H4410><s%> seed, <S%H2233><s%> and made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with him, and has taken <S%H935><s%> an oath <S%H423><s%> of him: he has also taken <S%H3947><s%> the mighty <S%H352><s%> of the land: <S%H776><s%>

That the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> might be base, <S%H8217><s%> that it might not lift <S%H5375><s%> itself up, but that by keeping <S%H8104><s%> of his covenant <S%H1285><s%> it might stand. <S%H5975><s%>

But he rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against him in sending <S%H7971><s%> his ambassadors <S%H4397><s%> into Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> that they might give <S%H5414><s%> him horses <S%H5483><s%> and much <S%H7227><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%> Shall he prosper? <S%H6743><s%> shall he escape <S%H4422><s%> that does <S%H6213><s%> such <S%H428><s%> things? or shall he break <S%H6565><s%> the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and be delivered? <S%H4422><s%>

As I live, <S%H2416><s%> said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD, <S%H3069><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> in the place <S%H4725><s%> where the king <S%H4428><s%> dwells that made him king, <S%H4427><s%> whose <S%H834><s%> <S%H853><s%> oath <S%H423><s%> he despised, <S%H959><s%> and whose <S%H853><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> he broke, <S%H6565><s%> even with him in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> he shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> with his mighty <S%H1419><s%> army <S%H2428><s%> and great <S%H7227><s%> company <S%H6951><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> for him in the war, <S%H4421><s%> by casting <S%H8210><s%> up mounts, <S%H5550><s%> and building <S%H1129><s%> forts, <S%H1785><s%> to cut <S%H3772><s%> off many <S%H7227><s%> persons: <S%H5315><s%>

Seeing he despised <S%H959><s%> the oath <S%H423><s%> by breaking <S%H6565><s%> the covenant, <S%H1285><s%> when, see, <S%H2009><s%> he had given <S%H5414><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and has done <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> things, he shall not escape. <S%H4422><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> As I live, <S%H2416><s%> surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> my oath <S%H423><s%> that he has despised, <S%H959><s%> and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> that he has broken, <S%H6331><s%> even it will I recompense <S%H5414><s%> on his own head. <S%H7218><s%>

And I will spread <S%H6566><s%> my net <S%H7568><s%> on him, and he shall be taken <S%H8610><s%> in my snare, <S%H4686><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> him to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and will plead <S%H8199><s%> with him there <S%H8033><s%> for his trespass <S%H4604><s%> that he has trespassed <S%H4604><s%> against me.

And all <S%H3605><s%> his fugitives <S%H4015><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> his bands <S%H102><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and they that remain <S%H7604><s%> shall be scattered <S%H6566><s%> toward all <S%H3605><s%> winds: <S%H7307><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it.

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> I will also take <S%H3947><s%> of the highest <S%H6788><s%> branch <S%H6788><s%> of the high <S%H7311><s%> cedar, <S%H730><s%> and will set <S%H5414><s%> it; I will crop <S%H6998><s%> off from the top <S%H7218><s%> of his young <S%H3127><s%> twigs <S%H3127><s%> a tender <S%H7390><s%> one, and will plant <S%H8362><s%> it on an high <S%H1364><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> and eminent: <S%H8524><s%>

In the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the height <S%H4791><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> will I plant <S%H8362><s%> it: and it shall bring <S%H5375><s%> forth <S%H5375><s%> boughs, <S%H6057><s%> and bear <S%H6213><s%> fruit, <S%H6529><s%> and be a goodly <S%H117><s%> cedar: <S%H730><s%> and under <S%H8478><s%> it shall dwell <S%H7931><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> fowl <S%H6833><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> wing; <S%H3671><s%> in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of the branches <S%H1808><s%> thereof shall they dwell. <S%H7931><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%> shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have brought <S%H8213><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> the high <S%H1364><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> have exalted <S%H1361><s%> the low <S%H8217><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> have dried <S%H3001><s%> up the green <S%H3892><s%> tree, <S%H6086><s%> and have made the dry <S%H3002><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> to flourish: <S%H6524><s%> I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> and have done <S%H6213><s%> it.
